name: Trouble Shooter (itch) (Guron)
description:
Made as a solo project during the first Finnish College Jam.

The theme for the jam was "Break the Rules". Try to find the secret ending!

I was one of the organizers of the jam, but I really wanted to join the actual fun as well, so here's a little side project. I made the design, code, music and SFX during the jam. Other assets were CC0.

The game is a isometric top-down shooter with a twist. You are a troubleshooting AI and your objective is to manage rogue subprograms in a world gone a little glitchy.
